akn:content.akn:p: (a) Except as provided in section 53513 of this title, a withdrawal from a fund that is not a qualified withdrawal shall be treated as a nonqualified withdrawal.
(b) A nonqualified withdrawal shall be treated as made—
(c) For purposes of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (26 U.S.C. 1 et seq.)—

(d) The rate of interest under subsection (c)(3)(B) for a nonqualified withdrawal made in a taxable year beginning after 1971 shall be determined and published jointly by the Secretary and the Secretary of the Treasury. The rate shall be such that its relationship to 8 percent is comparable, as determined by the Secretaries under joint regulations, to the relationship between—
